Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.debugrender.api.client

Class GraphLibDebugRenderClient

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.graphlib.debugrender.api.client.GraphLibDebugRenderClient
public final class GraphLibDebugRenderClient extends Object
Graph Lib Client-Side Public API. This class contains static methods and fields for registering BlockNodeDebugPacketDecoders and renderers.

  • Method Details

    • registerDebugDecoder

      public static void registerDebugDecoder(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation universeId, net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation typeId, BlockNodeDebugPacketDecoder decoder)
      Registers a BlockNodeDebugPacketDecoder in the given universe for the given block node type id.

      Only register a decoder if you also register an encoder with GraphLibDebugRender.registerDebugEncoder(ResourceLocation, ResourceLocation, BlockNodeDebugPacketEncoder) to provide custom node data to the client.

      Parameters:
      universeId - the universe this decoder is to be registered under.
      typeId - the block node type id this decoder is to be registered for.
      decoder - the decoder.

    • registerDebugRenderer

      public static <N extends DebugBlockNode> void registerDebugRenderer(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation universeId, net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation renderId, Class<N> clazz, BlockNodeDebugRenderer<N> renderer)
      Registers a BlockNodeDebugRenderer in the given universe for the given block node render id.

      Only register a renderer if you need custom rendering for your nodes. GraphLib has default renderers that fill most use cases.

      Type Parameters:
      N - the type of the DebugBlockNode that this renderer expects.
      Parameters:
      universeId - the universe this renderer is registered under.
      renderId - the render id this renderer is to be registered for.
      clazz - the class of the DebugBlockNode that this renderer expects.
      renderer - the renderer.

    • registerDebugRendererForAllUniverses

      public static <N extends DebugBlockNode> void registerDebugRendererForAllUniverses(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation renderId, Class<N> clazz, BlockNodeDebugRenderer<N> renderer)
      Registers a BlockNodeDebugRenderer for the given block node render id for all universes.

      Only register a renderer if you need custom rendering for your nodes. GraphLib has default renderers that fill most use cases.

      Renderers for specific universes take priority over this. It is advised to only register for the universe(s) you expect your renderer to be used in.

      Type Parameters:
      N - the type of the DebugBlockNode that this renderer expects.
      Parameters:
      renderId - the render id this renderer is to be registered for.
      clazz - the class of the DebugBlockNode that this renderer expects.
      renderer - the renderer.
